title: Ritual Coffee Roasters French Press
preparation_steps: Grind 28 grams of coffee to medium-fine consistency
Pre-warm French Press with hot water
Add 28g ground coffee to French Press

brewing_steps.instruction: Start timer and pour 448g hot water evenly over grounds
Stir gently with bamboo spoon to create even extraction
brewing_steps.short_instruction: Stir with bamboo spoon • Even extraction

brewing_steps.instruction: Place lid on top, do not press plunger
Press plunger down slowly, pour immediately

notes: Ritual Coffee's French Press method focuses on precision and artistry. The medium-fine grind and shorter extraction time create a bright, nuanced cup while maintaining the characteristic body. Perfect for showcasing single-origin coffees.
